bio: Your gateway to the world of NFTs and Optimism Stacks. We're an NFT art community committed to educating web3 newcomers through exceptional artistry.
contributionDescription:
As a pioneer community on Optimism, we continually educate new users about Web3, NFTs, and Optimism by distributing complimentary NFTs to promote Optimism and OP stacks. 

As an NFT art community, we view NFTs as the initial entry point to blockchain technology and protocols. We provide a warm, non-judgmental atmosphere where newcomers can comfortably learn, ask questions, and begin their journey into Web3. 

Furthermore, we support emerging protocols and artists by assisting them in launching their collections and promoting them within our community to ensure they have a positive experience on Optimism.

contributionLinks.description: Bored Town collection, 5555 NFTs created on Optimism since June 2022.
Bored Town x Optimism Art Contest with 723 questers and 200 winners.
Collection of 200 NFTs from the 1st round on Bored Town x Optimism Art Contest.
A link on X to promote the collection featuring 100+ artists on Optimism.
Base of Bored, the first free mint collection on Base, deployed on our platform.
Free mint NFT collections deployed on our launchpad.
A list of NFTs we have deployed on multiple chains and drew users to Optimism.

impactDescription:
So far, we have amassed 46,000 followers on X, with 18,700 members on Discord, and our 20+ collections across various blockchains, predominantly on Optimism, have engaged with 28,800 wallets.

We maintain strong relationships with other protocols such as Galxe, Guild.xyz, Clique, QuestN, and Opti.domains. Furthermore, we provide support for up to 200 artists who have participated in our art contest. Several of them have already launched their first NFT collections on Optimism and OP stacks through our launchpad, receiving outstanding backing from our community.

To date, we have successfully incubated 8 collections, with a total supply of up to 35k, and all of them were fully minted within less than 2 hours during public mint events.

impactMetrics.description: Bored Town x Optimism Art Contest

fundingSources.description: We have received 20,000 OP and are currently awaiting an additional 30,000 OP.
